help.Description: output a of list commands and global arguments or output help about a command

Syntax.commandName: help about the command with name commandName

exclude-ambiguous-grammar.--exclude-ambiguous-grammar: exclude any ambiguous grammar when parsing command line arguments. by default, the first matching grammar is selected in the command line arguments parser

parser-logging.--parser-logging logLevel:
set up the logging level of the parser
possibles values from Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.LogLevel
for Trace or Debug the parser add detailed informations about the parsed grammars
